description: In this course you are going to learn how to convert a full PSD for landing page to HTML5, CSS3 & JavaScript. Along the way, you will learn a lot of tips and tricks to help you develop your own landing page as well as few JQuery plugins to help you enhance the function of the landing page and make it more creative. There are a lot of ways to build your own landing page but what if you built one like this by yourself? Ehab Alaa is here to walk you through making a beautiful creative landing page in this course. This is not a beginners course and some knowledge of HTML5, CSS3 is required. You will also get hands-on with some jQuery and learn some very beautiful ways to help take the homepage to the next level!
title: PSD To a Creative Landing Page Using Twitter Bootstrap 3
